docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Banzhen is a goddess who travels through China spreading smallpox, accompanied by two young attendants called Elder Brother Smallpox and Elder Sister Smallpox. Mariyamman is a goddess who scatters smallpox among the Tamils of South India and Sri Lanka whenever she is angered. Shopona is a god who uses smallpox to punish members of the Yoruba people of

headline.main: Plague Years In the Imagery Of Those Who Endured Them
